title.rendered: Canada vs Papa New Guinea, World Cup Qualifiers, 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team on basis of probable XIs, recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Canada: Aaron Johnson, Matthew Spoors, Pargat Singh, Srimantha Wijeratne(w), Harsh Thaker, Nikhil Dutta, Saad Bin Zafar(c), Ravinderpal Singh, Dillon Heyliger, Kaleem Sana, Jeremy Gordon

PNG: Tony Ura, Kiplin Doriga (wk), Sese Bau, Assad Vala (c), Hiri Hiri, Charles Amini, Riley Hekure, Gaudi Toka, Chad Soper, Semo Kamea, John Kariko

Also Read:

Delhi vs Gujarat Fantasy Tips

Pitch Report

Venue: United Cricket Club Ground, Windhoek

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 279

2nd innings average score: 269

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Balanced

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Player data to follow…
